Description.Text: From the frontier France/Spain: On the motorway A7 toward Girona. Aprox. 65 km after the frontier (exit7) leave the motorway and after toll-booth go straight on in direction Platja d'Aro until Platja d'Aro Nord. About 35 km from the motorway exit drive slowly. Before driving under the bridge, you will see the first Hapimag sign on your right. Turn to the right, always following the Hapimag signs, after approx. 6 km you arrive at the Hapimag resort. From the airport Girona: Leaving the airport turn right in the direction of Barcelona, Girona. At the next roundabout keep in the direction Barcelona, Girona and Platja d'Aro. You pass 7 small roundabouts and keep always in the direction of St. Feliu de Guixols and Platja d'Aro. After approx. 23 km you will see the sign Platja d'Aro. Continue on the motorway until the exit Platja d'Aro Nord. Drive slowly, after a short time (km 315) you will see the first Hapimag sign on your right. After approx. 6 km you arrive at the resort.

The hotel draw special attention to the higher risk of theft in holiday regions. Specifically, there have been experiences of thefts of cars, luggage, valuables and money, yet also of "pick-pocket" and similar thefts. It highly recommend to check the insurance cover before starting the holiday.

This basic hotel was built in 1992 and comprises a main building and an annexe block with a total of 192 apartments. Facilities on offer include a foyer with a 24-hour reception desk, a currency exchange facility, a lift, a small supermarket and a restaurant. Those arriving by car may take advantage of the car park and medical assistance is available on request.
